arts.ttl: Initial reaction from Des Buckingham as U’s continue perfect home start
arts.sum: DES Buckingham was pleased with how his Oxford United players expressed themselves individually and within the team framework in their win at home to Stoke City.

arts.ttl: U’s maintain perfect home start thanks to first goal for Idris El Mizouni
arts.sum: A FIRST goal in Oxford United colours for Idris El Mizouni was enough for the U’s to see off Stoke City.

arts.ttl: Oxford win again at home as they see off Stoke
arts.sum: Oxford's impressive start to the Sky Bet Championship season continued with a well-earned 1-0 victory against Stoke at the Kassam Stadium.

arts.ttl: Stoke City player ratings vs Oxford as insipid Potters made to pay price
arts.sum: Moran was dynamic and able to join in play, like he did immediately at the start of the second-half when he was picked out by Burger and pulled back for Manhoef, who couldn’t then find a teammate. Oxford couldn’t get into the Stoke box either but were tempted to try their luck from distance, with Mark Harris spinning to hammer a shot close to Viktor Johansson and Gooch gifting a chance for Tyler Goodrham to force a decent save.

arts.ttl: Idris El Mizouni strike maintains Oxford’s perfect start to season at home
arts.sum: The U’s edged out the Potters thanks to Idris El Mizouni’s coolly-taken strike.

arts.ttl: Oxford United vs Stoke City live - Team news from early kick-off at Kassam Stadium - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: Tom Cannon is ready to make his Stoke City debut after showing Steven Schumacher his ability and hunger as he has joined in training. When he’s got opportunities in the training sessions whether we’ve played 11 v 11s or even small-sided games he’s shown the ability he’s got in front of goal.

arts.ttl: Million Manhoef chat as Stoke boss delivers 'ideal' verdict
arts.sum: “He’s got a number of goals last season, he’s started this season positively but I think there are loads of areas in his game he can improve on and he’s a really good kid. He wants to get better and I’ve got loads of time for people like that.”

arts.ttl: Laurent and Baker are no loss to Stoke and now we should see best of Burger
arts.sum: Laurent could be particularly frustrating because he has all the attributes but if you don’t work hard enough then the attributes don’t come out as regularly as they need to when you’re a senior player in a side that should be challenging at the right end of the Championship. It is a talent to be able to score from free-kicks and shoot from long range like Baker and you need someone in your team who has that capability but in terms of functioning possession play he wasn’t involved enough.

arts.ttl: Mark Harris shortlisted for goal of the month – watch them all here
arts.sum: SKY Bet Championship player of the month Mark Harris is now in the running for the division’s goal of the month.

arts.ttl: Des Buckingham ready for Potters reunion tomorrow afternoon
arts.sum: DES Buckingham is ready for a reunion with a team where he knows just how impressive things are behind the scenes.
